title: Coronavirus: Man rescued from Pyrenees fined for lockdown breach
description: The Frenchman was trying to walk from France to Spain to buy cheap cigarettes, reports say.
content:
Image copyrightPGHM rescue serviceImage caption
 The man was rescued after getting lost and falling into a stream
A man has been rescued by helicopter from the Pyrenees after trying to walk from France to Spain to buy cheap cigarettes, reports say.
